author: Lenny Reed
text: It is hard to be great at anything, without loving it first

author: Lenny Reed
text: Good architecture and design, should be considered insurance against future pain

author: Lenny Reed
text: Writing code is like singing a song, it's at its best when it flows freely

author: Lenny Reed
text: Success doesn't just happen, it takes effort and strong will

author: Lenny Reed
text: If you learn from every experience regardless of the outcome, no effort is wasted

author: Lenny Reed
text: The road to success is long, so get started today

author: Martin Fowler
text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

author: Jeff Atwood
text: Teaching peers is one of the best ways to develop mastery.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
text: The trick isnt adding stuff, it is taking it away.
